IQVIA Insights Agent.description: WHO's open data for health statistics and disease burden.

EXIM Trade Agent.description: International trade data (free up to 100K records per call).

EXIM Trade Agent.description: World Bank WITS API for trade and tariff data.

EXIM Trade Agent.name: U.S. Census International Trade API
EXIM Trade Agent.description: Free U.S. international trade data API.

Clinical Trials Agent.description: Registry of clinical trials; public REST API available.

Clinical Trials Agent.description: WHO clinical trials registry portal covering global trial registries.

Clinical Trials Agent.description: EU database of clinical trials for medicinal products.

Patent Landscape Agent.description: Free API for EPO patent data (up to 4GB/week free).

Patent Landscape Agent.description: USPTO Open Data Portal for patents (free access to USPTO patents).

Patent Landscape Agent.description: Lens.org provides patent and scholarly data APIs (free with registration).

Internal Knowledge Agent.description: FDA open APIs including drug labels, adverse events, manufacturer info.

Internal Knowledge Agent.description: Database of NIH-funded research projects; public API for research grant data.
